name: CreateEventSummaries
description:
Create event summaries for tracking user events.

This tool creates event summaries for a user, tracking the number of times an event has occurred along with the first and last occurrence.

parameters.name: intercom_version
parameters.description: Specify the version of the Intercom API to use. Options include versions 1.0 to 2.9.

parameters.name: user_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the user to create event summaries for.

parameters.name: event_name_for_summaries
parameters.description: The name of the event, typically a past-tense verb-noun combination like 'updated-plan'.

value_schema.description: The name of the event that occurred. A good event name is typically a past tense 'verb-noun' combination, to improve readability, for example `updated-plan`.

parameters.name: event_occurrence_count
parameters.description: The number of times the event occurred for the specified user.

value_schema.description: The number of times the event occurred.

parameters.name: first_event_timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp for when the event first occurred. Use an integer representing Unix time.

value_schema.description: The first time the event was sent

parameters.name: event_last_occurrence
parameters.description: The timestamp representing the last occurrence of the event.

value_schema.description: The last time the event was sent
